title: 2 Easy Ways to Send Silent Messages on Discord

steps.title: Open the Discord app.
steps.content: Open the Discord app. This looks like Discord's mascot, Wumpus, with a blue-purple background. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now. [1] X Research source Discord is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Navigate to a server or Direct Message.
steps.content: Navigate to a server or Direct Message. Tap a server from the left panel, or tap a recent Direct Message to open it.

steps.title: Type @silent.
steps.content: Type @silent . This command allows your message to be sent without any sound notifications.

steps.title: Type the rest of your message.
steps.content: Type the rest of your message. You can send text or attach files, such as photos or videos.

steps.title: Tap the airplane icon.
steps.content: Tap the airplane icon. This will send your message. The recipient can still see the red alert, but there will be no accompanying sound. When the message is viewed, a bell icon will be next to the time. This indicates a silent message.

steps.title: Open the Discord application.
steps.content: Open the Discord application. Discord is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux. [2] X Research source You can also use Discord in your browser at https://discord.com/ .

steps.title: Navigate to a server or Direct Message.
steps.content: Navigate to a server or Direct Message. Click a server from the left panel or a recent Direct Message to open it. If needed, you can start a server or join one.

steps.title: Type @silent.
steps.content: Type @silent . This command allows your message to be sent without any sound notifications.

steps.title: Type the rest of your message.
steps.content: Type the rest of your message. You can send text or attach files, such as photos or videos.

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter . This will send your message. The recipient can still see the red alert, but there will be no accompanying sound. When the message is viewed, a bell icon will be next to the time. This indicates a silent message.
